room_title: Escape room "The Haunted Theatre" by Captured LV Escape Room in Bethlehem
room_description: Ladies and gentleman, welcome to the downtown Bethlehem’s historic Ritz Theatre! Here you will find a star commemorating the theatre’s beloved actress, Lily L’Amour, who mysteriously disappeared at the height of her career in 1921. Coincidentally or not, her understudy, Minnie Mala, met her untimely death just one night later. The elevator will take you to other levels, just be sure not to stop at Lily’s old dressing room. After Minnie’s death, strange things began to happen there, and several aspiring actors have gone missing without a trace! Can you uncover the mystery and reverse the curse, or will this be the last tour of your lives?
